^SAMPLE = GSM4143659
!Sample_title = LT3
!Sample_geo_accession = GSM4143659
!Sample_status = Public on Dec 09 2019
!Sample_submission_date = Oct 29 2019
!Sample_last_update_date = Dec 09 2019
!Sample_type = SRA
!Sample_channel_count = 1
!Sample_source_name_ch1 = CD3+ immune cells
!Sample_organism_ch1 = Homo sapiens
!Sample_taxid_ch1 = 9606
!Sample_characteristics_ch1 = patient: Lung3
!Sample_characteristics_ch1 = region: Tumor
!Sample_characteristics_ch1 = phenotype: Lung squamous cell carcinoma, keratinizing
!Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1 = Pre-treatment samples
!Sample_molecule_ch1 = polyA RNA
!Sample_extract_protocol_ch1 = Surgical resections procured and separated into tumor and NAT compartments by reviewing pathologist.  Samples rinsed with PBS, digested with Collagenase D and DNAse from 15 minutes at 37° C, and subjected to a gentleMACS dissociator, followed by an additional 10-minute incubation at 37° C.
!Sample_extract_protocol_ch1 = 10X Genomics Chromium Single Cell 5' Library and Gel Bead Kit
!Sample_extract_protocol_ch1 = PolyA priming for single-cell RNA-seq.  TCR enrichment using the Chromium Single Cell V(D)J Enrichment Kit, Human T cell
!Sample_description = Illumina HiSeq 4000 (scRNA-seq), Illumina HiSeq 2500 (scTCR-seq)
!Sample_data_processing = Illumina base call (BCL) files converted to FASTQ using "cellranger mkfastq"
!Sample_data_processing = Expression data processed with "cellranger count" using a custom reference package of 30,727 genes from RefSeq gene models
!Sample_data_processing = TCR data processed with "cellranger vdj" and the custom reference package
!Sample_data_processing = Genome_build: GRCh38
!Sample_data_processing = Supplementary_files_format_and_content: Cellranger version 2.2.0
!Sample_platform_id = GPL20301
!Sample_contact_name = Thomas,D.,Wu
!Sample_contact_email = twu@gene.com

!Sample_contact_institute = Genentech, Inc.

!Sample_contact_city = South San Francisco
!Sample_contact_state = CA

!Sample_contact_country = USA
!Sample_instrument_model = Illumina HiSeq 4000
!Sample_library_selection = cDNA
!Sample_library_source = transcriptomic
!Sample_library_strategy = RNA-Seq
